title: Englands object, or, Good and true newes to all true-hearted subjects for the taking and apprehending of that horrid deluding sower of sedition, Hugh Peters, by the name of Thomson, in Southwarke, Saturday, September the first with his examination and entertainment by the rest of the rebellious crew now in the Tower of London.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Uere, and VV. Gilbertson,
